attributes.action: Ban fluoride in all products, it is a toxic substance with no health benefits.
attributes.additional_details:
Fluoride is a highly toxic substance. Consider, for example, the poison warning that the FDA now requires on all fluoride toothpastes sold in the U.S. or the tens of millions of people throughout China and India who now suffer serious crippling bone diseases from drinking water with elevated levels of fluoride. Fluoride is banned in many countries http://www.fluoridation.com/c-country.htm
I believe if you want the alleged benefits of fluoride, you fluoridate your own water and leave ours alone!
attributes.background: Fluoride is fed to you and your children unaware. Disguised as an effective aide to prevent tooth decay. It calcifies the pineal gland rendering it useless. Google it. IT IS A TOXIC SUBSTANCE WHEN INGESTED. It is also added to our water supply. If I disappear mysteriously, you know why. I tried.
